Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: This build was failed on July 14th and the issue is resolved on the same day due to outage at thirdparty site.

Action.author: scottz
Action.body: Ramesh, when you return an issue, or mark it invalid, or fixed, it is good practice to either close it or reassign it to the originator so they can consider/agree/close it.
